## PluginType

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/plugins/PluginCommon.ts" sourceLine="14" packageName="commandkit" />

Enum representing the type of plugin.
- Compiler: A plugin that runs at compile time.
- Runtime: A plugin that runs at runtime.

```ts title="Signature"
enum PluginType {
    Compiler = 'compiler'
    Runtime = 'runtime'
}
```
